
set ( LIBS ${LIBS}
           ${Boost_LIBRARIES}
           libdsgrn
           sqlite3 )

set( TARGETS 
        TestAnnotation
        TestComponents
        TestStrongComponents
        TestDigraph
        TestDomain
        TestWall        
        TestDomainGraph
        TestWallGraph
        TestMorseDecomposition
        TestMorseGraph
        TestNetwork
        TestOrderParameter
        TestParameter
        TestParameterGraph
      	TestPoset 
        TestPattern
        TestPatternGraph
        TestSearchGraph
        TestMatchingGraph 
        TestPatternMatch 
        )
        
foreach ( TARGET ${TARGETS} ) 
  add_executable ( ${TARGET} ${TARGET}.cpp )
  target_link_libraries ( ${TARGET} ${LIBS} )
endforeach ( TARGET )
